Name: Leviathan
About the game: Leviathan is third person view control whale phagocytosis game. Support to bulge&pit the Leviathan mesh and paint color&decal the Leviathan material. Act as a Leviathan,move the Leviathan to hit the samller Leviathan to get score, avoid the bigger Leviathan. Control: 1.Bulge&Pit scene.long click mouse left button to bulge mesh,long click mouse right button to pit mesh. 2.Paint&Decal scene.first, click Paint/Decal button,then press mouse left button to Paint/Decal mesh. 3.Play scene.press mouse right button to rotate Leviathan. move forward:key W move back:key S turn left:key A turn right:key D
